channel.title: Notes on Blake Ruprecht
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on Blake Ruprecht

item.title: exercise
item.description: All movement counts as exercise. If you walk enough, that’s exercise. Good exercise starts with nose-breathing. Barefoot footwear is important for stability, balance, and foot strength. Train cardio. Train muscles.

item.title: nutrition
item.description: Eat enough calories & nutrients Food fuels the body in the form of chemical energy, measured in calories. Eat as much as your burn, and you’ll maintain weight. Eat more, gain weight. Eat less, lose weight. You can tell if you’re eating enough by tracking bodyweight. Food builds the body in the form of nutrients. The reason a thousand different diets exist is because humans naturally want to eat the most rewarding foots – fatty, salty, sugary stuff.
